titleStmt.title: To the Honourable Mrs. E— Stretchy.
titleStmt.author: Elizabeth Rowe (née Singer)

bibl.title: To the Honourable Mrs. E— Stretchy.
bibl.author: Elizabeth Rowe (née Singer)

front.head: To the Honourable Mrs. E— Stretchy.

lg.l: THe Artful hand of Nature ne'r display'd
More skill, then when your was made:
A Shape, a Face, and Meen so rare, that we
Think you her boasted Master-piece to be;
Whilst that that Heaven has plac't within,
But since I on my Lyre can touch no String,
Equal to those great Merits, I would Sing,
Hopeless, to give such mighty Charms their due,
I'll leave the World to of you.
